data.text: Also, a side note. I’ve noticed that cheating on significant others has become very common. I think that has to do with this subject. We are a generation that cannot be satisfied. We’re constantly searching for the new definition of perfection and reaching for the next best thing
self image and men because they now expect perfection. Ok thank u for coming to my ted talk

me. I’m ashamed to say this, but you don’t know the amount of times I’ve actually felt anger towards my children because of how their pregnancies changed my bodies. I’m working on learning to embrace what I have but this is true. It’s toxic for women because it ruins a positive

don’t know the amount of times I’ve looked up prices for a Brazilian butt lift, breast augmentation & laser treatment to removes my stretch marks. You don’t know the amount of times I’ve cried because I felt I wasn’t enough for my boyfriend, the man who created these lives with

multiple children looks like that. There will be stretch marks and scars. You can work out to lose the weight but it won’t give you that dramatic body shape and giant, round butt with skinny legs. Those unrealistic body types require surgery and lasers. And it hurts women. You
